mapper.insert: insert into customer(name, email, password, phone, address, zipcode, address1, address2) values(#{name},#{email},#{password},#{phone},#{address},#{zipcode},#{address1},#{address2})
insert into seller(name, email, password, phone) values(#{name},#{email},#{password},#{phone})
mapper.select: select count(email) from customer where email=#{email}
